member.name: T:ConfigManager.Configuration
member.summary: A data type containing metadata about a configuration file.

member.name: P:ConfigManager.Configuration.Parsed
member.summary: The parsed object from the configuration file.

member.name: P:ConfigManager.Configuration.Raw
member.summary: The raw text read from the configuration file.

member.name: P:ConfigManager.Configuration.FilePath
member.summary: The filepath to the configuration file.

member.name: P:ConfigManager.Configuration.LastUpdated
member.summary: The time the configuration file was last updated.

member.name: T:ConfigManager.ConfigManager
member.summary: A utility class to make managing configuration files painless. ConfigManager uses json configuration files which map to strongly typed C# objects using ServiceStack.Text.DeserializeJson

member.name: M:ConfigManager.ConfigManager.AddConfig``1(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds a configuration to the manager.
member.typeparam: The type of the configuration object.
member.param: The name of the configuration object to add.
The file path (relative or absolute) to add.
Optional boolean argument that specifies the config should be updated if it exists.

member.name: M:ConfigManager.ConfigManager.GetCreateConfig``1(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds and then gets the configuration of a given name.
member.typeparam: The type of the configuration object.
member.param: The name of the configuration object to add.
The file path (relative or absolute) to add.
Optional boolean argument that specifies the config should be updated if it exists.
member.returns: An object of type T with the values in the specified config file.

member.name: M:ConfigManager.ConfigManager.CreateConfig``1(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a Configuration of the given type from the specified file path.
member.typeparam: The type of the configuration object.
member.param: The file path (relative or absolute) of the configuration file.
member.returns: An object of type T with the values in the specified config file.

member.name: M:ConfigManager.ConfigManager.RemoveConfig(System.String)
member.summary: Remove the specified config file from the ConfigManager

member.name: M:ConfigManager.ConfigManager.GetConfig``1(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the configuration object of the specified type and name from the in-memory dictionary of the ConfigManager.
member.typeparam: The type of the configuration object.
member.param: The name of the configuration object to retrieve.
member.returns: An object of type T with the values in the ConfigManager.

member.name: M:ConfigManager.ConfigManager.GetConfigUpdateTime(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the DateTime that the specified file was last written to.
member.returns: The DateTime that the specified file was last written to.

member.name: M:ConfigManager.ConfigManager.ReadConfig(System.String)
member.summary: Reads a relative or absolute file path and returns the contents. Nonrooted file paths are checked relative to the configured search directories.
member.returns: The contents of the file that was found, or empty string if no file present.

member.name: M:ConfigManager.ConfigManager.ParseConfig``1(System.String)
member.summary: Parses json into the specified object type.
member.returns: The contents of the raw json as the specified object type.

member.name: T:ConfigManager.ConfigManager.ConfigKeys
member.summary: A Utility Enum to ensure that typos aren't make for global configuration files.

member.name: F:ConfigManager.ConfigManager.ConfigKeys.ConfigPathsConfig
member.summary: Maps to the string of the same name.

member.name: T:ConfigManager.ConfigClasses.ConfigPathsConfig
member.summary: The strongly typed class to deserialize the global configuration file ConfigPaths.conf

member.name: M:ConfigManager.ConfigClasses.ConfigPathsConfig.#ctor
member.summary: Contructs the configuration with the default values for search paths, which are: the local application root directory, C:/Configs, and D:/Configs

member.name: P:ConfigManager.ConfigClasses.ConfigPathsConfig.Paths
member.summary: An ordered list of search paths to search in for configuration files.
